mapper.insert: insert into review(clubno, userid, username, hit, subject, content, ip, people, link, visitdate, location, revisit, score) values( ${clubno}, #{userid}, #{username}, ${hit}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{ip}, ${people}, #{link}, #{visitdate}, #{location}, #{revisit}, ${score})
mapper.select: select no, username, content, date_format(writedate,'%Y.%m.%d') writedate, hit, subject, date_format(visitdate,'%Y.%m.%d') visitdate, location, revisit, score ,link from review where clubno=${param1}
select no, username, content, date_format(writedate,'%Y.%m.%d') writedate, hit, subject, date_format(visitdate,'%Y.%m.%d') visitdate, location, revisit, score ,link from review where no=${param1}
